original_title: 2024 General Election: Number of MPs elected from each district revealed
original_body_lines: The Election Commission of Sri Lanka has issued a statement mentioning the number of Members of Parliament (MPs) to be elected from each district and the number of candidates in a nomination paper in the 2024 General Election.
The highest number of MPs will be elected from the Gampaha District with a total of 19 members to be elected.
General Election 2024 - Election Commission Statement by Adaderana Online on Scribd
